backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing access control, user approvals, profile management, and public form submissions with persistent storage maps and authorization checks.
feature_evidence.json: Defines feature evidence metadata for updating the founder image, including feature ID, components, and related test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists short summaries of all frontend source files, describing each component, page, hook, and style file.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base file defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes with global styling rules.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entrypoint mounting the React app using Vite and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with all site routes and renders the router along with the global toaster.
frontend/src/components/CallbackDialog.t: Dialog component for submitting callback requests with form validation and backend submission via a mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component showing company info, navigation links, contact details, branch locations, and social icons.
frontend/src/components/GetQuoteDialog.t: Modal component allowing users to select an insurance type and open a WhatsApp quote link.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Site header with navigation, call button, mobile menu, and integrated GetQuoteDialog trigger.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Layout wrapper rendering header, footer, and routed page content.
frontend/src/content/officeLocations.ts: Exports a list of office locations with names and addresses.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and manages the authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for submitting forms and managing testimonials through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with custom theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/AboutUsPage.tsx: Displays the companyâ€™s story, mission, values, and achievements using cards, text blocks, and icon sections. Provides a structured About Us layout with hero, story, mission, and values sections.
frontend/src/pages/ClaimAssistancePage.t: Renders a claim assistance guide with step-by-step instructions, emergency helpline alert, and support features. Includes interactive buttons for calling and WhatsApp contact.
frontend/src/pages/CompareEducatePage.ts: Presents educational insurance comparisons through cards and accordions, explaining term vs endowment plans and other coverage topics. Focuses on helping users make informed decisions.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Implements a contact form with validation, submission via a mutation hook, and toast feedback, alongside static contact information and office details. Supports calling, WhatsApp, and email links.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Provides the homepage layout with a hero section, insurance categories, and reasons to choose the service. Includes dialogs for quotes and callbacks and quick-action contact buttons.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Renders a services listing page defining multiple insurance service cards with details like benefits and target audience. Uses UI components and icons to display structured service information.
frontend/src/pages/TestimonialsPage.tsx: Implements testimonial viewing, submission, and admin deletion with form handling, YouTube URL parsing, and rating UI. Fetches and manages testimonials via custom hooks and displays them in cards.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters. Includes helpers for persisted URL parameters and hash-based parameter cleanup.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, animations, and theme settings including custom OKLCH-based palettes. Registers typography, container queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature requests, and state information related to updating the founder photo on the About Us page.
